        public boolean setFillingStyle(int nStyle)
        Sets a fill style value.
        Parameters:
        nStyle - The Fill style
        - SObjectFilling.SAMM_FILLING_STYLE_COLOR (filling with color)
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
